Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK. You might add your comments about the problem below: Thank you ! Send feedback E-Mail Name Message Send Discard Choose feedback type Thank you About this app DeblurIt Pro Version 1.1.0 Copyright 2013 Smallboxes Software http://smallboxessoftware.tk/ This application uses software under APACHE License (ActionBarSherlock, ACRA, JSSEProvider), CDDL-1.0 License(javamail-android). Some assets is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License. You can find third party licensing informationg by clicking the button below. Third party information Third party licenses OK Loading… Choose picture DeblurIt Pro HelpActivity This program uses 2 different filters to make your pictures better.

Unsharp mask filter is the best fit for small defects.
Deconvolution filter uses progressive algorithms to remove large defects.

This filters need PSF to sharpen images. PSF is a recipe of how the focused image turns into a blurred one. PSF looks just like image:

You can select the type of PSF and change its basic setting (like radius, length, angle) by manipulating appropriate seek bars.

Preview button generates thumbnail that shows how the result may look like. By default, resulting images are saved to /sdcard/Pictures/DeblurIt/ folder.
